item.title: Has Samsung Installed ‘Unremovable Israeli Spyware’ On Your Phone?

item.title: Russian Boat Marines Blast Their Way Through FPV Barrage With Shotguns

item.title: Drone tracking startup SkySafe will pay you crypto to buy and install its sensor
item.description: SkySafe is carving out a role as the FlightAware for drones and wants people to contribute to its network by buying a $949 sensor.
